subject: Curling
Olympic Games (2014)
Rock and Stone
lead_paragraph: Olympic curling stones come from rare granite quarried on the island of Ailsa Craig, an uninhabited Scottish island. It can be yours for $2.4 million.
snippet: Olympic curling stones come from rare granite quarried on the island of Ailsa Craig, an uninhabited Scottish island. It can be yours for $2.4 million.
